description: Assumes an impersonation role for the given WorkMail organization. This method returns an authentication token you can use to make impersonated calls.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization under which the impersonation role will be assumed.

parameters.name: ImpersonationRoleId
parameters.description: The impersonation role ID to assume.

nested_items.name: Token
nested_items.description: The authentication token for the impersonation role.

nested_items.name: ExpiresIn
nested_items.description: The authentication token's validity, in seconds.
